name: @primeira-fila/frontend
description: Workspace frontend com duas aplicacoes Next.js

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace web-customer && npm run build --workspace web-backoffice
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace web-customer && npm run lint --workspace web-backoffice && npm run lint --workspace @primeira-fila/shared
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace web-customer && npm run typecheck --workspace web-backoffice && npm run typecheck --workspace @primeira-fila/shared
